Experience Sales Compensation Analyst Oracle October 2013  – Present (1 year 11 months) Rocklin, California -Calculate commission/incentive award payments to sales personnel based on commission plan provisions. 
 
-Perform staff support activities needed for the development, implementation, communication and administration of sales commission or incentive programs, plans, policies and quotas. 
 
-Review commission payment reports for accuracy and completeness. 
 
-Able to verify and follow through, ensuring accuracy and timeliness of commission payments as outlined in the plan. 
 
-Resolve reconciliation issues. 
 
-Maintain or audit information needed to track revenue. 
 
-May analyze sales performance results, prepare commission expense reports, presentations and recommendations for sales and/or finance management. 
 
-May contribute to the development or improvement of systems to effectively track or capture data. 
 
-Ensure timely and accurate submission of License, Consulting, or Support Services Sales Teams commissions and/or bonuses in accordance with accepted compensation plans, terms and conditions, standard business practices, and internal controls. 
 
-Partner with customers to research and satisfactorily resolve compensation related inquiries. Electronic Fraud Analyst- Team Lead Citi June 2009  –  September 2013  (4 years 4 months) West Sacramento, CA -Selected by senior management to be the primary point of contact and responsible for execution of all new pilot programs and processes. 
 
-Responsible for the daily workflow of 35 analysts ensure the work is prioritized and completed in a timely manner to include resolution on all questions/issues that arise. 
 
-Work with Financial Centers, clients, vendors and back office units to mitigate loss exposure and/or coordinate recovery. 
 
-Conduct daily defect analysis review of losses and provide feedback to Management on potential fraud trends and training opportunities.  
 
-Accountable for over $50 million in saves for the 2012 fiscal year resulting in minimal client and bank impact. 
 
-Provide coaching and skills enhancement training to veteran and new analysts. Compiled training manuals to support skill development in multiple regions.  
 
-Assist with procedure reviews and re-writes where required.  
 
-Conduct monthly quality assessments for a team of up to 35 employees to guarantee department success.  
 
-Independently identify process inefficiencies and make recommendations and implement process improvements. 
 
-Responsible for the completion of daily MIS spreadsheets and reports for upper management. 
 
-Recognized with two quality excellence awards and ten star player awards for outstanding leadership, professionalism and commitment to the organization. Exceptions Processing Citibank September 2007  –  June 2009  (1 year 10 months) West Sacramento, CA -Specialized in researching and analyzing customer accounts.  
 
-Used organization and time management skills to ensure that work was completed timely, accurately and thoroughly.  
 
-Complied with all federal and internal rules, regulations and procedures. 
 
-Proficient in using problem solving techniques to ensure the department is accurately balanced at the end of the day.  
 
-Developed relationships and communicated regularly with branch and department managers to inform and disseminate information. 
 
-Recognized with two star player awards for exceeding internal and external customer expectations. Experience Process Specialist Infosys BPO June 2010  – Present (5 years 3 months) Bengaluru Area, India Process Specialist: 
Infosys BPO Ltd | 1st Oct 2013 Till date 
 
We provide Tier 1 support to internal users/Account Managers (Microsoft) who liaison for advertisers and publishers using clients advertising platforms for Display Advertising. We analyze, troubleshoot and program manage the issues between the engineering team to provide effective and timely resolution and front end all communication with requestors throughout the life cycle of the request.  
 
	My supports involves basic troubleshooting of the tools which we use to Build the ads, Reporting discrepancy, Live site issue on Web page, Apps (include mobile apps), Xbox360,Outlook, JavaScript, HTML and Flash to identify issues with existing codes and to ensure that qualitative details are delivered to our requesters. 
	Driving, defining and reviewing the SLAs, TAT and CSAT for the APAC region. 
	Ensuring CSAT and DSAT (Top Box and Bottom Box) targets are achieved month on month. 
	Training the new hires and ensuring Knowledge Management with in the APAC region which I take care of. 
	Root cause analysis on errors and providing timely responses to the customers and feedbacks to the peers who report to me. 
	Tools which we use CAP,CRM Dynamics, MC, CAT, ADexpert, CAM, Fiddler, DAAT, Diagnostic, Appnexus Console,Freeweheel.
